name: NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType
desc: Constants that allow an app to specify the correction indicator type displayed.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default indicator that shows a proposed correction.

items.name: case reversion
items.desc: Provides the option to revert to the original form after a correction has been made.

items.name: case guesses
items.desc: Shows multiple alternatives from which the user may choose the appropriate spelling.
